DOC.brief_summary: The study complete 500 subject across 9 clinical site evaluate precision accuracy SCOUT DS ( Diabetes Screening ) subject risk type 2 diabetes . The study involve two unique Scout device clinical site . Each site initially contain CS-1 ( Commercial SCOUT 1 ) `` A '' collection data . As become available , CS-1 `` B '' operating late version SCOUT software ship site . The NSEEDS study enroll patient at-risk type 2 diabetes meet study inclusion criterion ( meet one exclusion criterion ) approximately 9 clinical site distribute across United States . Eligible subject must least 18 year old , exist diagnosis diabetes , less 45 year old , must body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 25 least one risk factor type 2 diabetes . The data collect partial area receiver operator curve ( pAUC ) compute via method moment 20 % 50 % false positive rate base first valid Scout `` A '' measurement patient . The impaired glucose tolerance status determine average two hour , post challenge plasma glucose sample measure central laboratory . This compare 1000 bootstrap re-samplings calibration data pull cohort match collect study . A test conduct assure SCOUT performance lie within 95 % empirical confidence interval base bootstrap re-sampling .
DOC.brief_title: Noninvasive Screening Early Evidence Diabetes With SCOUT DS
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age great equal 45 year ; OR 2 . Age 18 44 year BMI > 25 one follow diabetes risk factor : Habitually physically inactive ( less 30 minute moderate physical activity , , day week ) Has firstdegree relative type 2 diabetes African American , Latino , Native American , Asian American , Pacific Islander Has deliver baby weigh > 9 lb previously diagnose gestational diabetes Hypertension ( ≥140/≥ 90 mmHg ) treat hypertension HDL cholesterol level < 35 mg/dL and/or fast triglyceride level ≥ 250 mg/dL treat dyslipidemia medication Has previously diagnose Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) Had impair glucose tolerance impair fast glucose previous test within last 3 year Conditions associate insulin resistance severe obesity acanthosis nigricans History vascular disease include heart attack , stroke , angina , coronary heart disease , atherosclerosis , congestive heart failure peripheral arterial disease Prior participation VeraLight study : VL2701 , VL2710 , VL2711 , VL2712 , VL2718 Diagnosed type diabetes , include type 1 2 Known , risk , photosensitivity reaction ( e.g. , sensitive ultraviolet light , take medication know cause photosensitivity ) Receiving investigational treatment past 14 day Psychosocial issue interfere ability follow study procedure Conditions cause secondary diabetes include Cushing 's syndrome , acromegaly , hemochromatosis , pancreatitis , cystic fibrosis Taking glucose lower medications* Known pregnant ( self report ) Receiving dialysis know renal compromise Scars , tattoo , rashes disruption/discoloration leave volar forearm .
